name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Docker**, as well as managing cloud infrastructure with **Terraform** and **GCP**. Skilled in deploying and orchestrating applications within **Kubernetes** environments, alongside managing databases such as **SQL**, **Redis**, and **MongoDB**. Proficient in **Linux** and **Bash** scripting, enhancing system performance and automation.

Demonstrated proficiency in **Python** development, with a robust background in AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing. Strong understanding of incident management and monitoring strategies using **Grafana**. Committed to compliance-driven development aligning with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Experienced in Agile methodologies to drive effective project delivery.
